title: Terrace RCMP arrest man near recycling depot
content_html:
Terrace RCMP arrested a man in posession of a pellet gun near the Return-It Centre recycling depot the afternoon of June 10.

Police had received a report of a man making threats, according to a statement from Terrace RCMP.

The man was released the same day with a court date scheduled.
